name: Hamburger
description: Juicy beef patty on a toasted bun with lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Our classic hamburger topped with melted cheddar cheese.

name: Bacon Cheeseburger
description: Our cheeseburger topped with crispy bacon.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A delicious plant-based patty topped with fresh veggies.

name: Chicken Sandwich
description: Grilled or fried chicken breast on a bun with lettuce and tomato.

name: Philly Cheesesteak
description: Thinly sliced steak with grilled onions and peppers, topped with melted provolone cheese.

name: BLT Sandwich
description: Crispy bacon, lettuce, and tomato on toasted bread.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: Melted American and cheddar cheese on grilled bread.

name: French Fries
description: Crispy, golden fries seasoned with our special blend of spices.

name: Onion Rings
description: Thick-cut onion rings coated in a crunchy batter and deep-fried to perfection.

name: Mozzarella Sticks
description: Breaded and fried mozzarella cheese sticks served with marinara sauce.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and our homemade Caesar dressing.

name: Greek Salad
description: Mixed greens, feta cheese, Kalamata olives, and our homemade Greek dressing.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Grilled chicken breast on a bed of romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and our homemade Caesar dressing.
